pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau Speaks with President-elect Sebastián Piñera of Chile | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today the Prime Minister spoke by phone with the President-elect of Chile, Sebastián Piñera. Prime Minister Trudeau congratulated President-elect Piñera on his electoral victory, and said how much he looks forward to closely collaborating with Mr. Piñera when he takes office on March 11.

Prime Minister Trudeau and President-elect Piñera reiterated the importance of the excellent Canada-Chile bilateral relationship and on regional collaboration. Discussion touched on the current crisis in Venezuela and advancing a progressive trade agenda through bilateral and regional agreements.
